result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt: Scheduling conference on November 8, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Discovery received. Offer received.  Atty. LaCombe is going to send counter offer to ADA Meyer, request additional scheduling conference.

Addendum to Order - Br. 2 Criminal Scheduling Order

Standard Conditions
Additional Conditions: 
No contact directly or indirectly with the party/parties named in the bail bond, no contact at their residence/property. 
Pick up personal belongings with police escort. 
Not to consume alcoholic beverages, illegal drugs or possess drug paraphernalia. 
Not possess controlled substances except for those medications specifically prescribed for him/her by a health care professional. 
Not to possess needles/syringes except with a valid prescription. 
Not to be on the premises of any tavern or business whose sole purpose is the sale of alcoholic beverages. 
Comply with day reporting requirements  - UA's & GPS

11:50 AM Prosecuting attorney Rebecca Meyer in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Ricardo Xavier Ortizhernandez appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Ali M Mahmood appeared by video for Ricardo Xavier Ortizhernandez. Interpreter Martha Hernandez sworn in. Defendant advised of rights. Received complaint/waived reading. NG Plea entered. 950 Marcy's law complied with. Probable cause found in the complaint. Bond set.
Pre-trial conference scheduled for August 23, 2022 at 01:45 pm.
Scheduling conference scheduled for September 27, 2022 at 08:30 am.
